1.text: Arrange 10 small cups on a baking sheet.

2.text: Put the berry blue jello in a bowl and whisk in the boiling water.
2.vid: /d/d5/Make Blue Hawaiian Jello Shots Step 2 Version 3.360p.mp4

3.text: Whisk in the Blue Curaçao, Malibu Rum, and pineapple juice.
3.vid: /a/af/Make Blue Hawaiian Jello Shots Step 3 Version 3.360p.mp4

4.text: Pour the liquid into the cups.
4.vid: /c/c8/Make Blue Hawaiian Jello Shots Step 4 Version 3.360p.mp4

5.text: Chill the jello shots for at least 4 hours.
5.vid: /e/e8/Make Blue Hawaiian Jello Shots Step 5 Version 3.360p.mp4

6.text: Garnish the shots with pineapple wedges and maraschino cherries.

7.text: Put 1⁄4 cup (59 ml) of the juice and vodka into a pan.
7.vid: /b/b0/Make Blue Hawaiian Jello Shots Step 7 Version 3.360p.mp4

8.text: Sprinkle half of the gelatin over and let it sit for 1 to 2 minutes.
8.vid: /5/5c/Make Blue Hawaiian Jello Shots Step 8 Version 3.360p.mp4

9.text: Stir and cook the mixture over low heat for 5 minutes.
9.vid: /6/6c/Make Blue Hawaiian Jello Shots Step 9 Version 3.360p.mp4

10.text: Turn off the burner and stir in the Blue Curaçao and rum.
10.vid: /a/ae/Make Blue Hawaiian Jello Shots Step 10 Version 3.360p.mp4

11.text: Pour the blue gelatin mixture into shot glasses.
11.vid: /a/a1/Make Blue Hawaiian Jello Shots Step 11 Version 3.360p.mp4

12.text: Refrigerate the blue gelatin layer for at least 1 hour.
12.vid: /5/5a/Make Blue Hawaiian Jello Shots Step 12 Version 3.360p.mp4

13.text: Mix the remaining juice and 1⁄4 cup (59 ml) of lemon syrup in a saucepan.
13.vid: /a/af/Make Blue Hawaiian Jello Shots Step 13 Version 3.360p.mp4

14.text: Sprinkle the gelatin over the liquid and let it soak for 1 to 2 minutes.
14.vid: /8/8c/Make Blue Hawaiian Jello Shots Step 14 Version 3.360p.mp4

15.text: Stir and cook the yellow gelatin for 5 minutes over low heat.
15.vid: /f/f8/Make Blue Hawaiian Jello Shots Step 15 Version 3.360p.mp4

16.text: Cool the yellow gelatin for 10 minutes and pour it into the shot cups.
16.vid: /f/f7/Make Blue Hawaiian Jello Shots Step 16 Version 3.360p.mp4

17.text: Refrigerate the jello for at least 2 hours.
17.vid: /1/14/Make Blue Hawaiian Jello Shots Step 17 Version 3.360p.mp4
